name: Enemy of the Word
description:
BEFORE START PLAYING YOU MUST "CLICK" INSIDE DE GAME WINDOW.

  • How fast and precise do you type? 
  • Are you a good FPS player?  

DON'T FOGET TO RELOAD YOUR GUN!

My First Game Jam Submission!

  • Low Poly FPS Pack (Free) 
  • Unity 2019.4
  • Lot of effort
